Package org.lightsleep.connection

Classes that supply database connections.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionSupplier
    Supplier interface for database connection.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConnectionSupplier
    The abstract connection supplier
    C3p0
    Gets database connections using c3p0 JDBC Connection Pool.
    Dbcp
    Gets database connections using Apache Commons DBCP 2.
    HikariCP
    Gets database connections using HikariCP JDBC Connection Pool.
    Jdbc
    Gets database connections using the DriverManager class.
    That refer to the following properties of lightsleep.properties file.
    Jndi
    Gets a data source using JNDI (Java Naming and Directory Interface) API.
    Refers to the following properties of lightsleep.properties file.
    TomcatCP
    Gets database connections using Tomcat JDBC Connection Pool.
    That refer to the following properties of lightsleep.properties file.

Package org.lightsleep.connection Description

Classes that supply database connections.
